Self Love: Love yourself first, because that's who you'll be spending the rest of your life with.
You are enough just as you are.
Be your own kind of beautiful.
Self-love is not selfish; you cannot truly love another until you know how to love yourself.
Happiness begins with loving yourself.
Confidence is the best outfit. Rock it and own it.
Self-care is how you take your power back.
You owe yourself the love that you so freely give to others.
Fall in love with taking care of yourself.
You are your best investment.

Wanderlust: Collect moments, not things.
Wander often, wonder always.
Life is short, and the world is wide.
Take only memories, leave only footprints.
Adventure awaits.
Work, save, travel, repeat.
Let’s find some beautiful places to get lost.
The best stories are found between the pages of a passport.
Not all those who wander are lost.
Travel far enough to meet yourself.

Spiritual Wisdom: अहिंसा परमो धर्मः (Ahimsa Paramo Dharma) - Non-violence is the highest virtue.
योगश्चित्तवृत्तिनिरोधः (Yogas Chitta Vritti Nirodhah) - Yoga is the stilling of the mind.
कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन (Karmanye Vadhikaraste Ma Phaleshu Kadachana) - You have the right to work, but never to the fruits of work.
सर्वं खल्विदं ब्रह्म (Sarvam Khalvidam Brahma) - Everything is indeed Brahman.
ध्यानं निर्वाणाय (Dhyanam Nirvanaya) - Meditation leads to liberation.
शांति सर्वत्र विजयते (Shanti Sarvatra Vijayate) - Peace conquers all.
न हि ज्ञानेन सदृशं पवित्रमिह विद्यते (Na Hi Jnanena Sadrsam Pavithram Iha Vidyate) - There is nothing more sacred than knowledge.
विद्याधनं सर्वधनप्रधानम् (Vidyadhanam Sarvadhanapradhaanam) - Knowledge is the greatest wealth.

तस्मादज्ञानसम्भूतं हृत्स्थं ज्ञानासिनात्मनः छित्वैनं संशयं योगमातिष्ठोत्तिष्ठ भारत (Tasmad Ajnanasambhutam Hrithstham Jnanasin Atmanah Chitvainam Samshayam Yogamatishtottishtha Bharata) - Arise, O Arjuna, and dispel the doubts in your heart with the sword of knowledge.

विद्याधनं सर्वधनप्रधानम् (Vidyadhanam Sarvadhanapradhaanam) - Knowledge is the greatest wealth.

तस्मादज्ञानसम्भूतं हृत्स्थं ज्ञानासिनात्मनः छित्वैनं संशयं योगमातिष्ठोत्तिष्ठ भारत (Tasmad Ajnanasambhutam Hrithstham Jnanasin Atmanah Chitvainam Samshayam Yogamatishtottishtha Bharata) - Arise, O Arjuna, and dispel the doubts in your heart with the sword of knowledge.
शिवोहम् (Shivoham) - I am Shiva, the eternal soul.
अहिंसा परमो धर्मः (Ahimsa Paramo Dharma) - Non-violence is the highest virtue.
योगश्चित्तवृत्तिनिरोधः (Yogas Chitta Vritti Nirodhah) - Yoga is the stilling of the mind.
कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन (Karmanye Vadhikaraste Ma Phaleshu Kadachana) - You have the right to work, but never to the fruits of work.
सर्वं खल्विदं ब्रह्म (Sarvam Khalvidam Brahma) - Everything is indeed Brahman.
ध्यानं निर्वाणाय (Dhyanam Nirvanaya) - Meditation leads to liberation.

Motivation: Your only limit is your mind.
Dream big, work hard, stay focused.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Do it with passion or not at all.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Believe in yourself and you will be unstoppable.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does—keep going.

Friendship: Friends are the family we choose for ourselves.
A good friend knows all your stories; a best friend helped you write them.
True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
A friend is someone who makes it easy to believe in yourself.
Friendship isn’t a big thing—it’s a million little things.
Friends make the world beautiful.
Side by side or miles apart, real friends are always close to the heart.
Happiness is having a best friend who is crazy like you.
We don’t need words, we have emojis.
A best friend is like a four-leaf clover—hard to find and lucky to have.
Friends are the family we choose for ourselves.

Office Life: Coffee: because adulting is hard.
Work hard so you can shop harder.
Meetings: where minutes are kept and hours are lost.
If Monday had a face, I’d punch it.
Why be moody when you can shake your booty?
Dress like you’re going to meet your worst enemy.
Work until your bank account looks like a phone number.
Just another day of pretending to work.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.

College Life: College is 10% studying and 90% figuring out how to get away with not studying.
Sleep, eat, study, repeat.
That awkward moment when you have to make life decisions but you still have to ask permission to go to the bathroom.
College is fun if you don’t die from assignments first.
Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.
My GPA is higher than my self-esteem. Just kidding, it’s not.
College: where dreams go to die.
Group projects: where one person does all the work, and everyone else gets the grade.
Exams are like Girlfriends—too many questions, difficult to understand, and the result is always disappointing.
I am not lazy, I am on energy-saving mode.

Shopping Vibes: Shopping is my cardio.
Retail therapy is cheaper than a psychiatrist.
You can't buy happiness, but you can buy new clothes and that's pretty close.
Life is too short to wear boring clothes.
I have enough clothes; I just need more hangers.
Whoever said money can’t buy happiness didn’t know where to shop.
Shopping is an art, and I am an artist.
My wallet and I are currently not on speaking terms.
When nothing goes right, go shopping.
